articles.content:

"No pressure."

articles.title: Padres' Jurickson Profar collapses after scary outfield collision with C.J. Abrams, carted off field
articles.description: San Diego Padres left fielder Jurickson Profar collapsed as he was trying to walk off the field after a scary collision with rookie shortstop C.J. Abrams and was then placed on a stretcher and driven away on a cart on Thursday night.
